title: Come watch the most toxic Challenger

embed.description: A subreddit to showcase new streamers and post when streamers are online, to post VODS for games. Discussion of streams, streamers and VODS is also welcome so that people can find a stream relevant to their interests an learn about the game. Feel free to post videos of good/bad plays so we can all learn!

replies.body: He called me scriptor, 10/10 would toxic again.
